items.content_html: LLRT (Low Latency Runtime) is an experimental, lightweight JavaScript runtime designed to address the growing demand for fast and efficient Serverless applications.
items.title: awslabs/llrt: LLRT (Low Latency Runtime) is an experimental, lightweight JavaScript runtime designed to address the growing demand for fast and efficient Serverless applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight and highly customizable table component for React. Designed with flexibility in mind, this component is perfect for developers who want full control over their table's appearance and behavior without the bloat of heavier solutions.

items.content_html: Task-Wise is a lightweight and intuitive to-do list application built with React.js, leveraging the power of the Context API for state management. With a clean and minimalist user interface, Task Wsie allows users to efficiently organize their tasks and stay on top of their daily goals.
items.title: sarthakvijayvargiya/Task-Wise: Task-Wise is a lightweight and intuitive to-do list application built with React.js, leveraging the power of the Context API for state management. With a clean and minimalist user interface, Task Wsie allows users to efficiently organize their tasks and stay on top of their daily goals.

items.content_html: GreenSock Animation Platform (GSAP) is a lightweight, powerful JavaScript library for timeline-based animations. With precise control, developers can create engaging animations. TweenMax enables complex animations with minimal JavaScript. Club GreenSock's DrawSVG plugin adds dynamic animations.
items.title: vishalgunjalSWE/GSAP-Workshop: GreenSock Animation Platform (GSAP) is a lightweight, powerful JavaScript library for timeline-based animations. With precise control, developers can create engaging animations. TweenMax enables complex animations with minimal JavaScript. Club GreenSock's DrawSVG plugin adds dynamic animations.
